resources.string:
This app is for calling number and send sms through adb. 
 Official adb interface for calling and sending sms is not working on all devices, and has some incompatibility with terminal via some languages such as Golang. 

 to call use in terminal

 adb shell am start -n imanpour.ali.callsmsgateway/imanpour.ali.callsmsgateway.MainActivity -e cmd 'call' -e phone '123456789' 


 to send sms use in terminal 

 adb shell am start -n imanpour.ali.callsmsgateway/imanpour.ali.callsmsgateway.MainActivity -e cmd 'sendSMS' -e phone '123456789' -e message 'text message'


 be sure to give all needed permissions in app settings.
